ygData.subject: RE: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think the mask is Ac4, +13 CHA, +7 MR (or something like that). These things have become so passe on my server, but you can have some fun with them. I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John.Curry@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
>Date: Fri, 8 Oct 1999 10:30:34 -0600
>
>Ok, this has got me really excited. I am not sure how the Guise of the
>Deciever works. Could someone post about the Guise? A Dark elf Bard.. wow
>that is really tasty. I am mainly wondering if the illusion accuratly
>represents your current armor? Any info would be appreciated. I would
>really like to freak people out by singing songs and wearing that cool
>skull
>helmet that the Dark Elves get to wear.
>
>Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
>Minstrel of Bristlebane
>23rd Human Bard
>on Brell

I think the mask is Ac4, +13 CHA, +7 MR (or something like that).
These things have become so passe on my server, but you can have some fun
with them. I think human-types and large races make the best use of the
illusion because of the smaller size and ultravision it gives you. For
anyone else it's just for show (pretty much - especially those that have
killed DE's).

I went to Neriak and killed some guards as a dark elf. The newbies had no
clue what was going on, and kept asking me why a dark elf would kill his own
guards.

Sartori D'Elsiraad of Quellious <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
